name: Ex-CEO
description:
I developed this game for the Wowie Jam 3.0!

Story:

You're the CEO of a company that's making TOO MUCH MONEY!  Destroy all of the technology in each office level before time runs out.  Unfortunately, as you pass levels, you're forced to give up your hard earned abilities!  Oh, you also only have 1 minute 30 seconds to get through all the levels including the boss level.  Have fun!

Controls:

WASD - Move around
Mouse - Look around
Left Click - Shoot
Space - Jump/Double Jump
1 2 3 Keys - Select an ability downgrade

Tutorial:

This menu will give the player information about controls and how the mechanics work.

RESET DATA:

This button simply resets the time left the player received when they beat the game.
